{instanceName} is an instance of the {mo: {instanceName} is an instance of the {mobilizon} software.
Powered by {mobilizon}. © 2018 - {date}: Powered by {mobilizon}. © 2018 - {date} The Mobilizon Contributors - Made with the financial support of {contributors}.
This event is accessible only through it: This event is accessible only through it's link. Be careful where you post this link.
Enter your email address below, and we'l: Enter your email address below, and we'll email you instructions on how to change your password.
Some terms, technical or otherwise, used: Some terms, technical or otherwise, used in the text below may cover concepts that are difficult to grasp. We have provided a glossary here to help you understand them better:
The instance administrator is the person: The instance administrator is the person or entity that runs this Mobilizon instance.
In the following context, an application: In the following context, an application is a software, either provided by the Mobilizon team or by a 3rd-party, used to interact with your instance.
An “application programming interface” o: An “application programming interface” or “API” is a communication protocol that allows software components to communicate with each other. The Mobilizon API, for example, can allow third-party software tools to communicate with Mobilizon instances to carry out certain actions, such as posting events on your behalf, automatically and remotely.
An instance is an installed version of t: An instance is an installed version of the Mobilizon software running on a server. An instance can be run by anyone using the {mobilizon_software} or other federated apps, aka the “fediverse”. This instance's name is {instance_name}. Mobilizon is a federated network of multiple instances (just like email servers), users registered on different instances may communicate even though they didn't register on the same instance.
SSL and it's successor TLS are encryptio: SSL and it's successor TLS are encryption technologies to secure data communications when using the service. You can recognize an encrypted connection in your browser's address line when the URL begins with {https} and the lock icon is displayed in your browser's address bar.
Set an URL to a page with your own priva: Set an URL to a page with your own privacy policy.
The {default_privacy_policy} will be use: The {default_privacy_policy} will be used. They will be translated in the user's language.
Enter your own terms. HTML tags allowed. The {mobilizon_terms} are provided as template.
Enter your own privacy policy. HTML tags: Enter your own privacy policy. HTML tags allowed. The  {mobilizon_privacy_policy} is provided as template.
NOTE! The default terms have not been ch: NOTE! The default terms have not been checked over by a lawyer and thus are unlikely to provide full legal protection for all situations for an instance admin using them. They are also not specific to all countries and jurisdictions. If you are unsure, please check with a lawyer.
Displayed on homepage and meta tags. Des: Displayed on homepage and meta tags. Describe what Mobilizon is and what makes this instance special in a single paragraph.
A place to explain who you are and the t: A place to explain who you are and the things that set your instance apart. You can use HTML tags.
A place for your code of conduct, rules: A place for your code of conduct, rules or guidelines. You can use HTML tags.
Can be an email or a link, or just plain: Can be an email or a link, or just plain text.
Your email address was automatically set: Your email address was automatically set based on your {provider} account.
You can't change your password because y: You can't change your password because you are registered through {provider}.
Error while login with {provider}. Retry: Error while login with {provider}. Retry or login another way.
Error while login with {provider}. This: Error while login with {provider}. This login provider doesn't exist.
Only accessible to members of the group: Only accessible to members of the group
The group will be publicly listed in sea: The group will be publicly listed in search results and may be suggested in the explore section. Only public informations will be shown on it's page.
You have been removed from this group's: You have been removed from this group's members.
Since you are a new member, private cont: Since you are a new member, private content can take a few minutes to appear.
[This comment has been deleted by it's a: [This comment has been deleted by it's author]
Are you sure you want to <b>suspend</b>: Are you sure you want to suspend this group? As this group originates from instance {instance}, this will only remove local members and delete the local data, as well as rejecting all the future data.

Are you sure you want to suspend this group? All members - including remote ones - will be notified and removed from the group, and all of the group data (events, posts, discussions, todos…) will be irretrievably destroyed.
Are you sure you want to <b>completely d: Are you sure you want to completely delete this group? All members - including remote ones - will be notified and removed from the group, and all of the group data (events, posts, discussions, todos…) will be irretrievably destroyed.
This is like your federated username (<c: This is like your federated username ({username}) for groups. It will allow the group to be found on the federation, and is guaranteed to be unique.
Groups are spaces for coordination and p: Groups are spaces for coordination and preparation to better organize events and manage your community.
Keep the entire conversation about a spe: Keep the entire conversation about a specific topic together on a single page.
Create to-do lists for all the tasks you: Create to-do lists for all the tasks you need to do, assign them and set due dates.
A place to store links to documents or r: A place to store links to documents or resources of any type.
A cookie is a small file containing info: A cookie is a small file containing information that is sent to your computer when you visit a website. When you visit the site again, the cookie allows that site to recognize your browser. Cookies may store user preferences and other information. You can configure your browser to refuse all cookies. However, this may result in some website features or services partially working. Local storage works the same way but allows you to store more data.
A place to publish something to the whol: A place to publish something to the whole world, your community or just your group members.
You'll need to transmit the group URL so: You'll need to transmit the group URL so people may access the group's profile. The group won't be findable in Mobilizon's search or regular search engines.

A short tagline for your instance homepa: A short tagline for your instance homepage. Defaults to "Gather ⋅ Organize ⋅ Mobilize"
Mobilizon is a tool that helps you <b>fi: Mobilizon is a tool that helps you find, create and organise events.
Ethical alternative to Facebook events,: Ethical alternative to Facebook events, groups and pages, Mobilizon is a tool designed to serve you. Period.
Mobilizon is not a giant platform, but a: Mobilizon is not a giant platform, but a multitude of interconnected Mobilizon websites.
When a moderator from the group creates: When a moderator from the group creates an event and attributes it to the group, it will show up here.
Only group moderators can create, edit a: Only group moderators can create, edit and delete posts.

Anyone wanting to be a member from your: Anyone wanting to be a member from your group will be able to from your group page.
The only way for your group to get new m: The only way for your group to get new members is if an admininistrator invites them.
This setting will be used to display the: This setting will be used to display the website and send you emails in the correct language.
Mobilizon uses a system of profiles to c: Mobilizon uses a system of profiles to compartiment your activities. You will be able to create as many profiles as you want.
Mobilizon is a federated software, meani: Mobilizon is a federated software, meaning you can interact - depending on your admin federation settings - with content from other instances, such as joining groups or events that were created elsewhere.
This instance, <b>{instanceName} ({domai: This instance, {instanceName} ({domain}), hosts your profile, so remember its name.
If you are being asked for your federate: If you are being asked for your federated indentity, it's composed of your username and your instance. For instance, the federated identity for your first profile is:
